title: Teammates Intentionally trying to make false reports
body: Does it piss anyone else off that sometimes your teammates that don't like you and they say "Report (X) for calling us racist slurs the entire game" The people that do that to others need to get a chat banned

replies.body:
They do get banned for calling for reports. 

You don't get punished for report volume alone. You get punished for **valid** report volume. 

False reports get discarded by the system, so no need to get pissed off at them.
I have yet to see someone get punished for saying "Report X for Y", thats false hands down.

It's true that just saying 'report x for y' alone is not a punishable offense. 

But people are punished when they use that phrase for the purpose of harassment.


Which means if you say "report ahri for no skin" or "report soraka for not dying", you'll be fine. 

In OP's context, the person asking for reports was certainly using it in a way of wanting to get someone banned. Which is of course harassment.

I know what youre saying, but trust me, you wont get banned for saying, "Report irelia for calling me the N word.", or "Report Irelia hes really toxic". Neither of those will get banned, I can almost 100% guarantee you that. I know the banning system almost more than anyone here except for Riot of course, and asking to report someone will not get you punished.

> I know the banning system almost more than anyone here

How so? You made a degree in LOL behavioral system?

I have 32 perma banned accounts, I know what bans you, I know how many games is needed for each ban section, I know what words ban the worst, I know what gives you instant 14 day ban, and more. I have said myself almost all the time to report x for y or some shit and I still have yet to see that register a ban. I can give you all 90 of my chat restrictions, and I can guarantee you wont find any "report x for y"

Actually You WILL get punished for Lobbying/soliciting reports on players, as constantly saying "Report X for.....' is a means of intimidation and harrassment. 
It is an attempt to not only publicly intimidate/shame a player for a percieved slight, but it is also intended to "dogpile" the other players in the match on that one person. Its the Equivelent of being the one handing out torches and pitchforks and saying "I didnt sick the mob on that person, all I did was make sure they all had torches and pitchforks and pointed them in the direction of the person.

Reports are to be done SILENTLY and By YOURSELF. 
Lobbying other players for reports on a player is a form of harrassment and IS a punishable offence. 
so anytime I see someone saying "Report X for...." I report the one lobbying for the reports, Not the player they are trying to sick the mob on.

This is wrong.
Remember what each and every one of you people have been spamming for the last year here?

THE IFS DOES NOT CARE ABOUT CONTEXT !!

Now what WILL happen is that you can submit a report ticket and Riot will unban your account if there is no history of toxicity or no toxicity in the logs on the IFS reform card, in that case.

If you ever get a manual review (like if you're protesting your punishment) then it will come up that you were calling for someone to be reported which would validate a punishment. 

We have seen this in the player behavior where someone says "but I wasn't toxic" and yet the chat logs show the person telling other players to report a team mate for trolling, feeding etc... That is toxic behavior and that means that the player saying "but I wasn't being toxic" is wrong because calling for reports is toxic.

The system only cares whether you were toxic. It doesn't care WHY you were toxic.

While it is true that the zero tolerance system within the IFS doesn't care about ANY context at all, as Riot doesn't want people using ZT phrases under any circumstance, that rule doesn't apply to the whole IFS.

This is untrue - the regular IFS doesn't understand context because it simply takes too much programming to make a bot smart enough to understand anything outside of basic "word report used, add the appropriate weight to scan".

Even the word "you" has a punishment weight regardless of context used.

Heh, if the search function worked any better on the boards, I'd show you the post from Riot Tantram explaining how the ML system works. 

Learning machine modules and AIs are smarter than you think.

I did my electronic engineer's thesis on neural networks and learning machines.

There MAY be slight weight reduction from "yeah use this word there" phrases but they'll still add weighting.
I've seen a lot of threads in this forum where that is precisely the reason someone got chat restricted/banned.

I get pissed off when that happens not at the fact that I think I would get banned but, because they are genuinely that stupid enough to think that making false reports would get me banned. The stupidity pisses me off.

Shouldn't you feel sorry for them instead?

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
I'm not sure they're stupid. Just either ignorant of how the system works, or attempting to get you to engage with them so they can hit you with a valid report.

Its just the lack of knowledge of how the report system works that causes these things.



BE GRATEFUL FOR TIKTOK, AT LEAST MUSICALI AINT COMIN TO YOUTUBE

There are premades who threat people with 4 reports if you don't do what they want.

Even if those reports are discarded by the system, it still a form of psychological pressure/torture, even if it's pathetic or too small.
Exactly... premades are the only place i ever get chat bans from.

The thing is; you get chat ban for saying toxic/negative things. Maybe it is premade people who make you feel like typing those words, but it is you yourself who actually types them to the client and thus it is you yourself who gets you punished. Learn some self control and _mute & report_ those who behave inappropriately.

PS: Also, if you have gotten chat bans (plural), you are most likely going to get the first suspension punishment the next time you get punished. The first suspension is also the final warning. After that there is only the permanent suspension. Remember; _Mute & Report._ 
PPS: Even if all the premades report you, their reports only count as one. Even if everyone else in game reports you, those nine reports still counts as only one report according to Riot Tantram. Thus there is no point in report calling other than harassing someone (and harassing someone might lead into punishment).

Actually, what sucks is premades and duos in solo q.  I have a few different accounts, but I will literally play for weeks or months and continually get praise, key fragments, etc.  Then one game, someone starts flaming me (happened today during champ select because someone wanted to switch roles).  Then in the game they start griefing and flaming.  My weakness is not being able to just ignore them.  Of course they are part of a premade... they all agree to report me.  I get a 10 game chat restriction.  It always happens with premades or duos with people who are playing with buddies.  Problem is, you never know if they get banned for their behavior... or just because it is 3-1 you only get the chat ban.  Irritates me.  The system is flawed.  You can get flamed all day from a group of friends, but the moment you respond ..chat ban.

 Idiotic if you ask me.  And it happens like clockwork every few months.
